PIXI Bright-C Stickers

Brand: Pixi

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Cellulose Gum, Diethylhexyl Adipate, Ascorbic Acid, Niacinamide, Hyaluronic Acid.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
